page.title: 01Stonehaven and area to south
page.content: 1. Farming - good cropping land. Main crops, barley and grass. Potatoes and turnips also grown, beef cattle are grazed in summer, in winter sheep are taken from the hills to graze. 2. Stonehaven expanding quickly. Reason, influence of oil industry. Very little fishing now, harbour used by Robert Gordons Institute of Technology for Survival Training also used for water sports. 3 Recreation, most of the recreation facility are situated in north of Stonehaven. In south Stonehaven, main attraction Dunnottar Woods. 4. Railway, connection between Aberdeen in north and Edinburgh,Glasgow and London to south. A number of people use the train daily to travel to work. 5. Roads, by pass opened November 1984. Benefits 1. little heavy
